bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II
bibl.note: FÒrow probãtvn was a rent on sheep which belonged to domain administration; in the course of the second century it became a compulsory lease at a fixed sum. <phoros probaton>
EL-ABBADI Mostafa, FÒrow probãtvn: Tax or Rent? <phoros probaton>
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 205-215.
